property.name: objectName
property.label: Object Name
property.description: API name of object to display records

property.name: fieldSetName
property.label: Fieldset Name
property.description: API Name of object fieldset to be used to display fields as columns (Default = true)

property.name: actionFieldName
property.label: Action Field Name
property.description: (Optional) Field to display link for detail view

property.name: filters
property.label: Filters
property.description: (Optional) SOQL query filters to be used to filter records

property.name: sortByFieldName
property.label: Sort by
property.description: (Optional) Field to be used for sorting

property.name: sortDescending
property.label: Sort Descending
property.description: (Optional) Sorts data in descending order (Default = false)

property.name: maxRecords
property.label: Maximum number of records to display
property.description: (Optional) Maximum number of records to display (Default = 5)
